column2: I would rather have someone else do it if it's something that absolutely needs doing.{nl}Why does it always have to be me?
The demons and monsters are still at large...{nl}At least we don't have to worry about being robbed by highwaymen.{nl}That is if we can make it out alive.
You go out scouting for days then you have to write up a report for days more!{nl}Can we get anything done in this state?
I'm here to assist Tadas.{nl}I'm not here to clean up after Wolke's mess.
I've tricked Kartas and prevented him from stealing the Seed of the Divine Tree.{nl}If I could break away from these seals, I would be able to recover on my own.
Why would Kartas go so far as to imprison me under this barrier...{nl}Does he really know the properties of this seed...?
I'm going to find Miss Neringa as soon as I feel a little better.{nl}I'm sure she will know a way for us to rescue Master Medeina from Kartas.
Revelator! There's an evil barrier surrounding the forest, it's dangerous in here!{nl}Please, you have to go!
We're trapped inside Kartas' barrier, and Master Medeina's powers aren't enough to break it.{nl}We need to help her regain her strength...
If Kartas finds us, we'll be in great danger.{nl}Please, help Master Medeina recover.
I'm glad Ilona is safe at least, despite the barrier.{nl}Revelator, please look for a way to deactivate the barrier.
Take Ilona and find Master Medeina.
Her footprints stop here. Should we look inside the courtyard?
Oh, I'm so glad Master Medeina is safe!{nl}That Teleportation Magic Circle needs to be destroyed...
Revelator, please destroy the magic circle.{nl}This might be the only chance we get while Kartas is gone.
Master Medeina's barrier is finally gone.{nl}We should hurry now...
Overloading the second magic circle worked!
Oh... Master Medeina...
She...
I was too late...
Although Master Medeina was taken by Kartas...{nl}Your precious help will always be remembered, Revelator.{nl}
Defeat the Nuka Warrior, Nuo Assassin

On the request of Receptionist Ramda of the Mercenary Post defeat the monsters at the Road of Demise.
Wait, could it be...are you the Revelator?
We are in grave danger.{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the dimension started collapsing from time to time.

The monsters nearby accelerate the collapse.{nl}This will spread to the whole continent if not prevented beforehand.{nl} I need the help of the Revelator as it is a matter beyond my power.{nl} Please, lend me a hand.
Be careful not to get swept into the dimensional collapse.{nl} It would be wise to approach when you're fully prepared.
Prevent the dimension from collapsing
That's correct.
Not really.
Talk to the Sage Envoy.
The Sage Envoy at the Fallen City is providing Revelators something. Talk to the Sage Envoy.
We are investigating a recent severe cold wave that happened here.{nl}
Three investigations revealed that the demons beneath this cliff were responsible for the severe cold wave.{nl}
Demon's name is..{nl}
Glacia.{nl}
It was a demon called Glacia.{nl}We also found a black crystal floating on a special device.{nl}Not sure what it is, but it was condensing strong magical power.{nl}
Several attempts were made to defeat Glacia, but they failed to break through the cold wave and the demons.{nl}
I heard about the Revelators activities.{nl}Please help defeating the Glacia.
Well, I'll see you again when you are ready to go down the cliff.
If you go down the cliff, it will be hard to ask for additional support.{nl}It won't be easy to break through the cold wave generated by Glacia.{nl}
We will be here to help the Revelator ride the cage and descend safely down the cliff.{nl}
I am counting on you about the Glacia.
Revelator.{nl}Would you mind taking a moment?{nl}
Last time, while researching the bottom of the cliff, I found a few things.{nl}Among them, this red liquid..{nl}It wasn't freezing in the cold, it only had thin ice on it.{nl}
I collected it since it seemed so peculiar.{nl}If there is anyone you could trust to analyze, I will leave it to you, Revelator.
Thank you.{nl}Please come back to me when the analysis is complete.
Are you saying that you want to analyze the solution? {nl}It's not difficult to do, but I feel ominous about it.
I need a plant to make sure.{nl}I don't care what it is, so can you get me one from nearby?{nl}After all, lengthy plants are growing not far from here.
Please come back to me when the analysis is complete.
This..{nl}
seems to be Kruvina.{nl}I have heard about it from the rumor.{nl}It's in the form of a liquid, but... It's the first time I actually saw it.{nl}
However, there is more blood mixed here.{nl}I think... someone vomited this with blood from their body.{nl}
For example, It may be the demon Glacia like you said.{nl}
It's a bad sign.
We ask that you investigate this with responsibility.{nl}Something like this, not only the ordinary demon will desire for it.
You're back.{nl}
Alright.{nl}We will take care of the process and investigation of this solution. {nl}Thank you very much for your help.
Revelator.{nl}I heard of a story about a mysterious woman witnessed among soldiers in a camp on the Stogas Plateau.
I received orders to maintain my current position. {nl}As the investigation wasn't reported to the Master, I don't think I can move.{nl}Could you meet the camp soldiers instead of me?
Thank you for your help.{nl}If you look for Stogas Commanding Officer Ades in the camp, you'll be able to save your effort.
Did you come after hearing an eyewitness about a mysterious woman?

I totally remember.{nl}Strange thing was, she was crying for help but she seemed to be ignoring us when we tried to help her.{nl}Also, she muttered that no one was helping her.{nl}She seemed like she was out of her mind.
If it's hard to understand, ask Mortimer.{nl}He was the one who found her.
If you look for Stogas Commanding Officer Ades in the camp, you'll be able to save your effort.
Yes? What is it?{nl}
Ask Soldier Motimer about the woman.{nl} He was the one who found her.
Your asking about the woman.
Oh, but it's not a good time.{nl}I am in a hurry.{nl}While I'm finishing my job, you might look at the road to the Gehima Empty Lot.{nl}It was around there, where I first found the woman.
I'll get the work done in a hurry, so please check out the roads of the Gehima Empty Lot first.
I'll get the work done in a hurry, so check out the roads of the Gehima Empty Lot first.
I was looking for you, Revelator.
That shackle..{nl}It is the shackle from the woman.

She was staring at the air and asked for help as if she couldn't see or hear us at all.{nl}I was trying to help, but I couldn't.{nl}She moved toward Second Almol Work Place muttering that no one was helping her.

It seemed difficult to survive on this location.{nl}Come to think of it, her eyes staring in the air were strange.{nl} I think there weren't any black parts of the pupil.{nl} Taking steps seemed to be difficult for her, so breaking the shackle was all I could do.
You're here.{nl}Have you finished the investigation about the woman witnessed at the camp?
So that's what happened.{nl}It is very likely that she has come up to this place and fell down the cliff.{nl}She may not be safe for sure.
Kruvina Liquid was on the fallen object means...that the woman must be the Glacia.
Based on what the Revelator has investigated and what we've been investigating, it seems that Glacia was harmed by a larger being.{nl}There must be a demon behind this that harmed her.
Revelator.{nl}I think it's time to go down the cliff.{nl}Tell me whatever you find at the White Witch's Forest.
Glacia might have become this state after she fell off the cliff.{nl} Tell me whatever you find at the White Witch's Forest.
Revelator for now..
Stop, please.
Revelator.{nl} I need to tell you something.
I am the commander here.{nl}Please refrain from any unauthorized investigation activities.{nl}Even if you are a revelator, you will be at a disadvantage if you break the laws of the Kingdom.

I would like to say my sincere appreciation for the dedication of the Revelator who cooperated with the investigation.{nl}However, if any enemy is a threat to the new world, he must be punished.{nl}That's the only duty for the Crusader.
Please refrain from arbitrary investigation from now on.
We are investigating the abnormal severe cold wave coming from the Nubarsk Cliff.{nl}However, we are having difficulties due to insufficient manpower.{nl}If you are okay, can you help me?
Thank you.{nl} Let's go to the Nubarsk Cliff.
Abnormal severe cold wave is coming from Nubarsk Cliff.
Thank you for helping the investigation.{nl}If enough evidence is gathered, I will take it to the kingdom and prepare for plans.{nl}I'm worried about the lack of manpower all the time.
I can't help you.
White Witch and the Crusader(1)
I am busy with other things right now.
White Witch and the Crusader(2)
I'll do my best on this task.
I want to quit.
White Witch and the Crusader(3)
I don't want to be involved anymore.
White Witch and the Crusader(4)
I am not interested.
White Witch and the Crusader(5)
Share the result of the investigation.
The investigation is not finished yet.
White Witch and the Crusader(6)
I have other things to do.
White Witch and the Crusader(7)
Show the letter.
Pretend not to know.
Abnormal Severe Cold Wave of Stogas Plateau
Help with the investigation.
Don't help with the investigation.
Talk to Crusader Master

The Crusaders Master, who was in charge of investigations in the Stogas Plateau, is asking for help from the Revelators.{nl}Go to Zofija Eleonora, Crusader Master of Stogas Plateau and listen to the story.
Get ready and go back to Crusader Master
It is said that Zofija had asked the Revelators for help in defeating the Glacia under the cliff.{nl}If you're ready to go down the cliff,  Return to Zofija and tell about it.
White Witch and the Crusader
Talk to Crusader Envoy
The Crusader Envoy seems to have something to tell you.{nl}Talk to the Crusader Envoy.
Collect Plants.
The Crusader instructed an investigation about the objects found during the exploration of the White Witch's Forest.{nl}Go to Plague Doctor Master and ask for an analysis of Red Liquid with Thin Ice.
Return to Plague Doctor Master
You have acquired the plant Plague Doctor Master asked for.{nl}Return to Plague Doctor Master and hand over the plant to finish analysis of the solution.
Receive the result of investigation from Plague Doctor Master
Talk to the Plague Doctor again.
The Plague Doctor Master expressed concern that the identity of the solution was Kruvina's Liquid.{nl}He seems to have something to request, so talk to the Plague Doctor Master again.
Return to Crusader Envoy.
Finished analysis of the solution.{nl}Return to Crusader Envoy and return the Kruvina Liquid.
Crusader Envoy said they would take up further investigations of the Kruvina Liquid.{nl}Talk to the Envoy again to ask if there is anything to help.
Stogas Commanding Officer Ades
The Crusader Envoy says there is a place where a figure suspected to be Glacia has been spotted.{nl}Go to Stogas Commanding Officer Ades at Stogas Plateau camping ground and listen to him.
Go to Soldier Motimer.
I heard the story of a woman who is suspected to be a Glacia from Ades.{nl}Go to Soldier Motimer for more details.{nl}
Talk to Soldier Motimer.
Listen to Soldier Motimer about a story of a woman who is suspected to be a Glacia.
Investigate incident place.
Investigate the place where the woman was found while Soldier Motimer completes his task.
Return to Soldier Motimer.

I found the Krubina Liquid at the scene of the incident, and I was able to find the shackle from the monsters.{nl}Go back to Soldier Motimer and show the results of the investigation and ask about the circumstances of the incident.
Retrieve Lost Objects
Hand over worn out shackle to Crusader Envoy
Finished investigation from the camping ground.{nl}Return to Crusader Envoy and tell the result of the investigation.
Talk to the Crusader Envoy to continue the investigation.
Conduct an investigation in the White Witch's Forest.
The Crusader Envoy guessed that there would be someone behind this.{nl}Investigate the Glacia's traces in the White Witch's Forest.
Deliver bunch of letters to Crusader Envoy.
Bring the Crusader Envoy items from the White Witch's Forest.
Talk to Crusader Master
Crusader Master Zofija Eleanora seems to have something to say. {nl}Talk to her.
Find Crusader Envoy.
Find Crusader Envoy who is investigating the abnormal severe cold wave of Stogas Plateau.
Investigate the abnormal severe cold wave coming from Nubarsk Cliff.
Investigate the abnormal severe cold wave coming from Nubarsk Cliff and tell about it to Crusader Envoy.
Tell Crusader Envoy about the investigation result of abnormal severe cold wave.
You came.{nl}I asked you for cooperation.
Since you have investigated about the Glacia, I think you are the one who knows the best about the truth.{nl}Will you cooperate with the investigation?
Thank you for your cooperation.{nl}The thing I gave you is the accessory from the Glacia's Cloth.{nl}We need to investigate how the Glacia could have survived from the demon and be here.
Please show that accessory to the demon and see how they react.
Thank you for your cooperation.{nl}Show shining marvel to the demon and see how they react.
You are back.
The demons were frightened away?{nl}It is true that the Glacia is a strong demon.. She might have been a human when she was passing here.
Then.. Maybe more than the Glacia might be related to this case.
Our last Envoy said that he have seen Suspicious Piece with Kruvina Liquid on near the root on the rock.{nl}We haven't touched a thing to preserve the scene.
I'll investigate for the piece, so please look for the Suspicious Piece and prepare for the investigation.
Go down the stairs to the left, and keep going, the Suspicious Piece is between the rock wall and the tree roots.{nl}Revelator, please go first and prepare for the investigation.
How should I tell...{nl}To start with the conclusion..
This piece has the power of demons over long years{nl}This is more of a power I have ever encountered.{nl}Maybe the Glacia is...
Would you believe that Glacia is no matter anymore compared to the master of power?
Investigation is in fast progress thanks to the Revelator's cooperation.
Inconveniently.. We need more convincing evidence to prove who or what is behind Glacia.
Did you say that the place where you found Glacier's letter last time was under the cliff?{nl}I would like you to go there and check again to see if there is any evidence that I missed at that time.
Please investigate the White Witch's Forest.
Instruction is definitely proof.{nl}It even has the name of Glacia.
But how come is it written in the language of humans? The power felt from the piece was definitely the power of the demon.
It wants to speak of its presence.
Now the proof that someone is behind is for sure.{nl}Revelator, while you were down the cliff, I have requested fora cooperation to the Kingdom.

It is said that there is a person in the kingdom who knows best when it comes to the power of the demons. {nl}Please give the Rangda master Uolios Wahid the pieces.{nl}Undesirable.. but it is an order from the Kingdom.
We're counting on you.{nl}If you pass that piece, there is no more thing left that you need to help.
Revelator, thank you for your help.
Glacia Casimila.{nl}It's Glacia's human name.
You came.{nl}Already heard about the story.
Strong energy.{nl}Had it not been for the Crusader Master's action, it would not have been strange if you fell down on your way to this place.

The owner of this power is the name of the land, given by the name of the Beholder.{nl}I will tell you more than this later if I have a chance.{nl}We'll take care of this piece.{nl}Will you hand it over to the girl next to you?
Rangda Girl
Treat her well, she is a kid.
Be careful not to lose your life getting involved in Dimensional Collapse and Division Singularity.{nl}Especially, behave carefully in the Division Singularity. It is an extremely dangerous place.
column5: Be careful not to get swept into the dimensional collapse.{nl} It would be wise to approach when you're fully prepared.

column2: If you're not ready enough, don't get any closer. Be ready thoroughly before approaching.
White Witch and the Crusader(8)
Cooperate with the investigation.
Won't cooperate with the investigation.
White Witch and the Crusader(9)
I'd be prepared.
Tell him to go there later
White Witch and the Crusader(10)
That's too difficult to do now.
White Witch and the Crusader(11)
I will pass it.
I can't help you.
White Witch and the Crusader(12)
I don't want to be involved anymore.
Find Crusader Master.
Crusader Master seems to have something to say to you.{nl}Go to her and ask her what's wrong.
Use Glacia's belongings to the monster.
As the Crusader Master asked, show Glacia's belongings to the monsters.
Report the result of investigation to the Crusader Master.
Monsters frightened away as you show the belongings of the Glacia!{nl}Tell the result of the investigation.
Crusader Master is trying to ask for cooperation for the next investigation.{nl}Talk to the Crusader Master.
Prepare for the Suspicious Piece.

The Crusader Master has received a report from the envoy about the Suspicious Piece that is believed to have been spilled by Glacier.{nl}Go to the Suspicious Piece and be prepared in advance for the Crusader Master to investigate.
Return to Crusader Master.
Crusader Master took the Suspicious Piece.{nl}Retur to her and hear about the result of the investigation.
Ask the Crusader Master what is needs for the next investigation.
Conduct an investigation in the White Witch's Forest(Legend).
The Crusader Master says that more convincing evidence is needed to identify the existence of the demons behind Glacier.{nl}Go back to the White Witch's Forest and look at the Worn Out Pouch.
Show Crusader Master the Mysterious Order you've found from the Worn Out Pouch.
Ask Crusader Master if more help is needed.
Go to Rangda Master.

The Crusader Master thanked for cooperating with the investigation, and finally asked to visit the Rangda Master to do a thorough investigation on the Suspicious Sculpture.{nl}Go to the Rangda Master in Saalus Convent and ask about the Suspicious Sculpture.
Talk to Rangda Master.
Hear opinions about the suspicious sculpture from the Langda Master.
Hand over the Suspicious Sculpture to Rangda Girl.

I heard the explanation of the Suspicious Sculpture from the Rangda Master.{nl}Because it is dangerous we have to entrust this sculpture to Rangda, who is more skilled in dealing with the power of the demons.{nl}Please hand over the sculpture to the Rangda Girl.
